external_games.name: Magicka 2: Gates of Midgård Challenge pack

name: Magicka 2: Gates of Midgård - Challenge Pack
summary: Three new Challenges - introducing environmental dangers to Magicka 2's Challenge Maps! Hordes of bloodthirsty enemies pour out from mysterious gates in the North, South and East, each with unique environmental dangers! One of the Challenges is truly a challenge – Bragging rights included!
